description: chcialbym kalkulator w html,css i javascript, pojedyncza strone
discoveryAnswers:
## Answers (iteration 1)
standard, minimalistyczny, obsluga klawiatury, bez historii, lokalny html, yes all clear.

phases.name: Structure & Display
phases.goal: Calculator appears with proper layout, display shows input
tasks: Create HTML structure: display area + button grid (0-9, operators, =, C, .)
Style with CSS Grid: 4-column layout, minimalist colors (dark/light contrast)
Style display: large readable numbers, right-aligned
Add button hover/active states for visual feedback

phases.name: Core Calculation Logic
phases.goal: You can perform calculations by clicking buttons
tasks: Implement display update on number/operator clicks
Implement equals (=) to evaluate and show result
Handle edge cases: division by zero, decimal point rules, leading zeros

phases.name: Keyboard Support & Polish
tasks: Add keyboard event listeners (0-9, +, -, *, /, Enter, Escape, Backspace)
Visual feedback: highlight button when corresponding key pressed
Final polish: focus management, prevent text selection, smooth transitions
